title: So many new things to try in v2.45.0
content:
Features:
- Snapping while moving content
- Brush stabilizer
- Layer content preview (hover to see bigger preview)

Enhancements:
- Custom row/column configuration when exporting sprite sheet
- Quick dimension swap button and aspect ratio preview in the new file panel
- The reference layer can be flipped
- Added a new shortcut-able action: Slider quick tool
- Removed the brief app freeze when using the color bucket/magic wand on really big canvases
- Some other UI enhancements

Fixes:
- A rare crash with iCloud storage
